Text.val: 24.04.2014 JH SCR18848 Added update of OAD330_GEN_HASH with PAIN_SCHA1CHECKSUM
06.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
02.08.2011 SH SCR16620 Introduced test PAIN_PAYMENTDATE = date() to populate
-- In case OAD330R is called without parameter, set necessary parameter to avoid
SQL error in the initialization part. Parameters are mandatory!
@Program uses same button labels as parent program OAD330
-- Button OK (Present payments again to create files by updating PAIN_RUNNUMBER)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select PAIN_RUNNUMBER, min(PAIN_BANK_ADMNO), min(PAIN_FILE_LEDG_NO), min(PAIN_BANKFILETYPE), min(PAIN_SPLIT_URGENT), min(PAIN_HGRP_CODE), min(PAIN_CURRENCY), min(ADMN_NAME), min(BANK_NAME), COUNT(*) as COUNT, cast(sum(PAIN_AMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)), min(PAIN_SHA1CHECKSUM) from :1/PAIN left outer join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = PAIN_BANK_ADMNO left outer join :1/BANK on BANK_ADMNO = PAIN_BANK_ADMNO and BANK_LEDG_NO = PAIN_FILE_LEDG_NO where PAIN_TRANSFERRED = 'Y' and PAIN_PAYMENTDATE = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':3' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') and :4 and PAIN_TYPE in (:5) group by PAIN_RUNNUMBER order by PAIN_RUNNUMBER for fetch only

Text.val: -- Start to re-initialize the data set for screen
-- Start to re-initialize the data set for screen
